settings.banner_text: Our budnle is the answer to create gorgeous defined, bouncy, shiny and healthy curls. It works on all hair types. Are you ready to create the best curls you can have.
settings.free_delivery_text: Free delivery on all orders over â‚¬50,-

settings.image_sub_title: Cleanse your curls with our peppermint clean shampoo.
Conditioner your hair with our Intense Protein Deepconditioner. Leave-on for 15 minutes and rinse out.
Apply the styling products on soaking wet hair.

settings.section_heading: WORLD WIDE THE MOST FAVORITE GEL
settings.section_sub_heading: Our Magical Flaxseed Gel will control your frizz and will give your curls an incredible curl definition with a magical shine.

settings.section_heading: We're a woman owned and driven to give you the best products for your curly hair.

settings.review_content: Pretty Curly girl products smell great and make my daughter's curls and mine totally "shine"
Previously bought expensive hair products for curls without valuable results. This stuff is unprecedentedly good. Now even have curls all over my hair, not just at the bottom!
I love PCG products! I started with the shampoo, conditioner and flaxseed on advice of my hairstylist. Recently I tried the shampoo and conditioner bars, also love them!!
All products are wonderful and delivered quickly. The shampoo conditioner and flaxseed are our favorite hair products

settings.section_heading: JOIN 20.000 OTHERS WITH PRETTY CURLY GIRL

settings.section_content:
Kinky, Coily, Wavy >>> It does not matter. With our product line we offer you the best products for your curls.

Start today and you will be amazed.

Be Pretty. Be Curly. Be You.
